Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group24.model.Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Simulation class all code to run the Simulation including time and variables will go here

        public void runSim(int ticks,
                   boolean logDebug)
        Run simulation for an amount of time
        Parameters:
        ticks - Time to run simulation in ticks (1 tick = 10 seconds)
        logDebug - Whether or not to log debug information

      • setFuelStationVal

        public void setFuelStationVal(int numPumps,
                              int numTills,
                              long seed,
                              double probabilityP,
                              double probabilityQ,
                              boolean createTrucks)
        Set the values for the fuel station
        Parameters:
        numPumps - set the number of pumps
        numTills - set the number of tills
        seed - Seed for simulation
        probabilityP - Probability for P
        probabilityQ - Probability for Q
        createTrucks - Whether to create trucks or not
